divs: Sighting Detailslooked out of window, and saw avery bright silver rotating object moving, north to northeast. It was really moving fast and was the size of a large rv. it was moving in straight line. watched it about 1 minute.
Summary: looked out window saw a fast moving oval,silver object moving.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around November 26th 2009
